nodes.text: Quell's apartment was an apartment located on the planet Nakadia. After the Battle of Jakku in 5 ABY, Yrica Quell stayed in the apartment under house arrest whilst her fate for her part in the destruction of Nacronis, as well as her actions during her service in the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, was decided. After meeting with New Republic Chancellor Mon Mothma to discuss Quell, General Hera Syndulla visited the apartment to inform Quell that she had been pardoned and was free to leave.
